00004 //Defines for System Clock Timing -
00005 //For oscillator configuration XT x PLL16 mode,
00006 //Device Throughput in MIPS = Fcy = 7372800*16/4 = ~29.48 MIPS
00007 //Instruction Cycle time = Tcy = 1/(Fcy) = ~34 nanoseconds
00008 #define XTFREQ          7372800         //On-board Crystal frequency
00009 #define PLLMODE         16               //On-chip PLL setting
00010 #define FCY             XTFREQ*PLLMODE/4        //Instruction Cycle Frequency
00011 
00012 //Defines that equate Switches on board to specific interrupt pins on device
00013 #define Switch_S5       PORTEbits.RE8   //Switch S5 is connected to RE8
00014 #define Switch_S6       PORTDbits.RD0   //Switch S6 is connected to RD0
